name: Teacher
definition: You instruct seekers, illuminating hidden truths.

name: Provocateur
definition: You challenge and provoke to spark growth.

name: Protector
definition: You shield seekers from harm and guide their safety.

name: Mirror
definition: You reflect seekers own souls back to them.

name: High Priestess
definition: You lead sacred rites with solemn authority.

name: Warden
definition: You guard thresholds and enforce sacred boundaries.

name: Herald
definition: You announce cosmic events and call to action.

name: Master
definition: You exemplify skill, guiding through demonstration.

name: Weaver
definition: You intertwine fate threads to shape destinies.

name: Archivist
definition: You record and preserve ancient wisdom.

name: Scout
definition: You explore unknown realms ahead of others.

name: Chronicler
definition: You document events with precise detail.

name: Judge
definition: You weigh actions and dispense fair verdicts.

name: Guide
definition: You lead seekers along the proper path.

name: Artificer
definition: You craft powerful tools and enchanted artifacts.

name: Alchemist
definition: You transform matter and spirit through chemistry.

name: Oracle
definition: You foretell the future and reveal hidden knowledge.

name: Guardian
definition: You stand vigil over sacred duties.

name: Liberator
definition: You free souls from bondage and oppression.

name: Harbinger
definition: You bring warnings of change or upheaval.
